name: n8n-nodes-pdf4me-word
description: n8n community node for Word document processing with PDF4me API: watermarks (text/image), extract metadata, optimize, compare, split/merge, delete pages, secure, update TOC, replace text, headers/footers
author: PDF4me <support@pdf4me.com>

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run validate-build && eslint -c .eslintrc.prepublish.js nodes credentials package.json
scripts.validate-build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const requiredFiles=['dist/nodes/Pdf4me/Pdf4me.node.js','dist/credentials/Pdf4meApi.credentials.js']; requiredFiles.forEach(f=>{if(!fs.existsSync(f))throw new Error('Missing required file: '+f);});"
